name: Simulation (gubebra)
description:
One of my dream games :) . Done in 2 weeks. Supposed to be challenging, but a lot of fun!

The game

You are inside a sumilated world, and do not know how you got there. Later, someone tells you that he wants you to explore this non real world for a cause you dont't know... yet. The world is being generated by your unconsciousness, and you realize that things may get difficult. As the game progresses, more challenges will appear, and the real horrible truth about your adventure is revealed. 

Controls

  • A - Run left
  • D - Run right
  • SPACE - Jump
  • ATTACK - Right mouse click
  • ATTACK DIRECTION - Mouse position
  • ESC - Pause

Have fun!

Programmer/Director

Gustavo Beltrao Braga

Special thanks to Huges

I can't thank you enought for releasing such an amazing asset for everyone to use. Your art is simply the most stunning one that I could have imagined for this game. Hope you enjoyed playing the game as well!

For you

Thank you por playing! I hope you enjoyed it as much as I enjoyed making it!! If you have any thoughts or feedback, please write them in the comments, I would love to hear all of them!
